name: Mario & Sonic: Dimensions Collide
description:
Story Summary:
Everything happened in Dr. Eggman's lab, when the doctor created a new weapon that could merge dimensions together. One day, the dimensions of Mario and Sonic collided because of Eggman's evil weapon. His plan is to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom and Mobius, at the same time! Mario and Sonic must work as a team to prevent Dr. Eggman from merging a third dimension!
